We were holding her hand, and she was responding to our hand-holding, she was rubbing her hands and she was gripping our hands so we could... we knew she could hear and understand what we were saying, she moved her leg. We knew she was responding. The lawmakers continued to joke about what they were going to do together, and as they did so, Gabrielle Giffords "started to open her eyes, literally," Kirsten Gillibrand said.
